customer_name: County of Hawai'i Department of Parks and Recreation
site_name: COUNTY OF HAWAII, DEPARTMENT OF PARKS & RECREATION

citations.narrative:
A wooden den box in a hybrid (Catalina) macaw enclosure is in disrepair as the surface appears warped in one area and
at least two edges are worn and splintering. The damaged areas can injure the bird. Housing facilities for birds must be
designed and constructed so that they are structurally sound for the species of bird housed in them. They must be kept in
good repair, protect the birds from injury. A system should be in place to ensure all bird enclosures, including den boxes
or any platforms, are repaired or replaced when in disrepair, for the health and safety of the animals.
To be corrected by March 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

Facilities, general.

To be corrected by March 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
